name: glaze-ui
description: Glaze UI is a framework that lets you have multiple Micro Front-End (MFE) applications on the same Single Page Application (SPA). That means you can have different frameworks like React, Angular and Vue running side-by-side. Including different versions of the same framework. It consists on a Glaze UI shell application that can host multiple MFE applications.
author: Juliano Teixeira
